binding:binding.name: IEC 62056-21 Meter Binding
binding:binding.description: This binding is used to communicate to metering devices supporting serial communication according mode C master. It can be used to read metering data from slaves such as gas, water, heat, or electricity meters.
binding:binding.author: Peter Kreutzer

parameter.name: echoHandling
parameter.label: Echo Handling
parameter.description: Enable handling of echos caused by some optical tranceivers

parameter.name: baudRateChangeDelay
parameter.label: Delay of baud rate change
parameter.description: Delay of baud rate change in ms. Default is 0. USB to serial converters often require a delay of up to 250ms default is 0ms

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial port
parameter.description: The serial port to use for connecting to the metering device e.g. COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux.
